summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney discussing the drafting of a letter to 'El' regarding a victim list in the Epstein case, noting that Bob Josefsberg has not heard back from Epstein's representatives.

persons.name: Bob Josefsberg
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who has not heard back from Epstein's representatives regarding the case.

events.title: Email regarding victim list letter
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails about drafting a letter to 'El' concerning the victim list in the Epstein case and notes lack of response from Epstein's team.

locations.name: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
locations.context: Address of the Assistant U.S. Attorney's office.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney is drafting a letter to 'El' regarding a victim list in the Epstein case.
Bob Josefsberg, an attorney, has not received a response from Epstein's representatives.
The communication indicates ongoing legal activity and victim identification efforts in August 2008.
